theorem StrictConvex.add (hs : StrictConvex ğ•œ s) (ht : StrictConvex ğ•œ t) :

  rintro _ âŸ¨v, hv, w, hw, rflâŸ© _ âŸ¨x, hx, y, hy, rflâŸ© h a b ha hb hab
  rw [smul_add, smul_add, add_add_add_comm]
